

# Fenergo Nebula MCP Connector Project

This project is an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that acts as a secure connector to the Fenergo Nebula API (api.fenergonebula.com/api/documentmanagement/investigate). 

## Key Requirements:
- OAuth2.0 authentication with authorization code flow
- TypeScript implementation
- AWS hosting deployment
- OpenAPI surface exposure
- Enterprise security guardrails
- GPT Store publishing readiness
- Single user authorization per session

## Development Guidelines:
- Follow enterprise security best practices
- Implement proper error handling and logging
- Use type-safe approaches throughout
- Ensure proper OAuth2.0 token management
- Follow MCP protocol specifications
- Prepare for AWS Lambda or ECS deployment
